A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: since I'm a positive person\, I'll start with the good things about this movie. it is a beautiful movie\, well shot with very cinematic scenes. it has great characters to work with. It deals with the relationship between Rey and kylo in a very interesting and poignant way. If all you want is a good movie then this film will suit you well. now for the bad that would be everything else. the main plot revolves around a Scooby Doo chase. Luke has given up. Finn is sent on a meaningless mission because they didn't know what to do with him. Poe is given a story arc that\, in truth\, does work\, but that should have been avoided by Haldo just telling him the plan. it didn't need to be a secret. at all. The first order has a HUGE friggin navy\, while the new republic has nothing. The thought of a disarming doesn't make sense because this movie shows a bunch of weapons dealers who are dealing to both sides. in other words\, the new republic would have known that there was a huge navy about to attack them. chewie is all of the sudden remorseful about eating meat?. snoke dies with zero explanation of who he was... etc. etc. etc. this is a good movie. it is a terrible star wats movie.
